delta:
I can do that. Before I do anything, I need some details and your explicit confirmation.

Please tell me:
- What exactly to delete (file paths, folder names, database/tables, cloud bucket + object names, etc.)
- Where it lives (Windows/macOS/Linux machine, cloud provider and account, server, phone)
- Whether you want permanent deletion (irreversible) or move to trash/archive first
- Whether there are backups or retention policies I should know about
- Any legal/regulatory or business constraints

Warning: permanent deletion may be irreversible and can cause data loss or service outage. I strongly recommend creating a backup (or letting me show a dry-run of what would be removed) before proceeding.

I will not perform any deletion until you explicitly approve. If you want me to proceed now, please confirm by replying with the exact confirmation phrase:
DELETE: <short description of what to delete>
(for example: DELETE: /home/alice/project folder on server-1)

If you prefer a dry-run or prepared deletion commands instead, say so.
